snippet.title: Aero Fighters (SNES) Playthrough - NintendoComplete
snippet.description:
A playthrough of Mc O'River's 1992 Super NES shoot em up arcade port, Aero Fighters.

Played through multiple times to show some of the hidden stuff:

0:00 Playthrough on hard with Villiam
18:48 Playthrough on hard with Rabio
36:16 Boss rush mode played on hard with Hien

This is a great port of the of Video System's arcade shooter Sonic Wings. The graphics and sound, though downgraded, still carry the arcade feel quite admirably, and though the game is a bit easy by SNES shooter standards, there's a fair amount of stuff hidden away to keep you occupied for several playthroughs. I remember this not being rated that well when it came out, and to this day I still have no idea why!

__________
No cheats were used during the recording of this video. 

NintendoComplete (http://www.nintendocomplete.com/) punches you in the face with in-depth reviews, screenshot archives, and music from classic 8-bit NES games!
